title: Apple, Google, Microsoft, and Samsung revise advertising over exaggerated AI claims after regulator scrutiny
description: Major technology companies are reassessing the way they promote artificial intelligence features after increased scrutiny from industry and federal regulators. Over the past year, Apple, Google, Microsoft,...
content: Cutting corners: As the landscape for AI-powered products evolves, companies face growing demands to deliver not just innovation, but clearly supported and honestly communicated claims about what their technology can actually do. "When you market AI ... [4401 chars]

title: This Is How Much AMZN, GOOGL, MSFT, and META Will Spend on AI This Year
description: Big Tech companies are ramping up their spending on artificial intelligence, with Amazon (AMZN), Alphabet (GOOGL), Microsoft (MSFT), and Meta (M...
content: Big Tech companies are ramping up their spending on artificial intelligence, with Amazon (AMZN), Alphabet (GOOGL), Microsoft (MSFT), and Meta (META) expecting a combined total of $364 billion in capital expenditures for 2025. This is a sharp increase... [1995 chars]

title: Tim Cook Says He’s “Open to M&A that Accelerates” Apple’s AI Plans

content: Tech giant Apple (AAPL) is changing its strategy on artificial intelligence, with CEO Tim Cook saying that the company is now willing to spend more in order to catch up to competitors. Interestingly, this could involve building more data centers or e... [2047 chars]

title: Meta Is Now Targeting Startups that Specialize in AI Videos
description: Social media firm Meta Platforms (META) is continuing its aggressive push into artificial intelligence by targeting startups that specialize in ...
content: Social media firm Meta Platforms (META) is continuing its aggressive push into artificial intelligence by targeting startups that specialize in creating and editing AI-generated videos. According to The Information, Meta recently held talks with Pika... [2023 chars]

title: IBM’s Data Breach Report Warns that AI Tools Are Growing Hacker Targets
description: Tech giant IBM (IBM) recently released its 2025 Cost of a Data Breach Report, which showed that companies are adopting artificial intelligence f...
content: Tech giant IBM (IBM) recently released its 2025 Cost of a Data Breach Report, which showed that companies are adopting artificial intelligence far faster than they are securing it. For the first time, the report looked at breaches that involved AI sy... [2162 chars]

title: Delta Air Lines Vows to Avoid AI-Driven Personal Pricing
description: Delta Air Lines has committed not to use artificial intelligence for personalized ticket pricing following criticism from U.S. lawmakers. While the airline will deploy AI-powered revenue management by 2025, it insists it will not base pricing on personal data. Senators remain concerned and demand clarity on data collection practices.
content: Delta Air Lines has assured it will refrain from using artificial intelligence to set personalized ticket prices, a move made after receiving sharp criticism from U.S. lawmakers. The decision aims to address concerns that individualized pricing could... [636 chars]

title: Meta to share AI infrastructure costs via $2 billion asset sale
description: (Reuters) -Meta Platforms is pressing ahead with efforts to bring in outside partners to help fund the massive infrastructure needed to power artificial intelligence, disclosing plans in a filing on Thursday to offload $2 billion in data center assets as part of that strategy. The strategy reflects a broader shift among tech giants — long known for self-funding growth — as they grapple with the soaring cost of building and powering data centers to support generative AI. The social media giant said earlier this week that it was exploring ways to work with financial partners to co-develop data centers to help finance its massive capital outlay for next year.
content:
FILE PHOTO: A new Facebook data center is under construction in Eagle Mountain
By Echo Wang
